Title: Maharashtra, Karnataka oppose move to reallocate Krishna water
Content: The Maharashtra and Karnataka governments made forceful pleas to the Krishna Water Disputes Tribunal against any steps to reallocate the Krishna river water afresh between the four riparian States.Co
Author: M. Rajeev
Description: The Maharashtra and Karnataka governments made forceful pleas to the Krishna Water Disputes Tribunal against any steps to reallocate the Krishna river water afresh between the four riparian States.Co
